name: 3e4661f9-0962-4799-a999-4c883e0bc056
description: Any asked question that only requires an answer consisting of one message.

text: If you forgot your password, you can always reset it on the login page via the 'Forgot your password?' link.

richContent.subtitle: Follow these steps to change your username in the game.
richContent.title: Changing your username

richContent.subtitle: 1. Open your game settings and switch to the profile tab.
2. Select the option 'Change username'. A new window will open, where you can input the needed data for the change.
3. Please choose a new username and confirm it as well. In order to be able to change the username, you also need to confirm this change by putting in your game account password.
4. Once you have confirmed the change, your username will be changed and you will be logged out. Afterwards you need to log in with your new username.
